channel.title: Can't pull redash image on google cloud
channel.description:
### Issue Summary I want to make self-hosted redash server on google cloud, so I worked according to [this document](https://redash.io/help/open-source/setup#gce). I executed this command ` gcloud compute images create "redash-8-0-0" --source-uri gs://redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz` on my google cloud console, but no response came and time outed. I tried other account, and the same result happened.
Another person encountered the same situation. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/69992222/creating-google-cloud-image-fails-with-could-not-fetch-resource-internal-error I doubted google cloud's incident, but google says incident has already recovered.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:8.0.0 * Browser/OS:MacOS,Chrome * How did you install Redash: -

item.title: Can't pull redash image on google cloud
item.dc:creator: MaxTeiger
item.description:
Same issue here ! I tried to download the image from gs://redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz

and got the issue :

ERROR: (gcloud.storage.cp) HTTPError 403: The billing account for the owning project is disabled in state closed

Just to inform you @jesse

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: jbonilla

I have confirmed that this is still an issue and not related to GCP networking issues. I am actually using this software in my course to show students data visualization. I hope someone can resolve this issue soon as this is very useful for us.

item.title: Can't pull redash image on google cloud
item.dc:creator: tsugitta
item.description:
I guess this is a problem of redash’s GCP account.

https://storage.googleapis.com/redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz

<Error>
  <Code>UserProjectAccountProblem</Code>
  <Message>User project billing account not in good standing.</Message>
  <Details>The billing account for the owning project is disabled in state delinquent</Details>
</Error>

Read full topic

item.title: Can't pull redash image on google cloud
item.dc:creator: canonrock
item.description:
Issue Summary

I want to make self-hosted redash server on google cloud, so I worked according to this document.
I executed this command gcloud compute images create "redash-8-0-0" --source-uri gs://redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz on my google cloud console, but no response came and time outed.
I tried other account, and the same result happened.

Another person encountered the same situation.

stackoverflow.com

Creating Google Cloud Image fails with "Could not fetch resource: Internal error"

google-cloud-platform, google-cloud-storage, gcloud, redash
asked by Dr-Bracket on 03:50PM - 16 Nov 21 UTC

I doubted google cloud’s incident, but google says incident has already recovered.

Technical details:

  • Redash Version:8.0.0
  • Browser/OS:MacOS,Chrome
  • How did you install Redash: -
